tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-49 at 2014 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (subject to second reshuffle)
tourBios.carHigh:
Previously played on the Hopkins Professional Tour and eGolf Tour.

2014: Finished T43 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Qualified for the U.S. Open and played the Wyndham Championship on the PGA TOUR (missed cut in both).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time Conference USA Player of the Week...Second-team All-Conference USA in his senior year...Finished second in a playoff at the 2013 Southern Amateur...Won a college tournament at the Ocean Course at Kiawah Island, S.C.
tourBios.personal: Attended Hewitt-Trussville (Alabama) High School...Favorite college team is the University of Alabama-Birmingham and favorite professional team is the New Orleans Saints...Favorite athlete is Bo Jackson and entertainer is Hank Williams, Jr...Dream foursome would be rounded out by his dad, Adam Scott and Jack Nicklaus...Charitable involvement includes time with Eagles Wings, a center for adults with moderate to severe intellectual and physical disabilities located in Tuscaloosa...Superstitions include marking his ball with a quarter from the 1950s or 1960s because "I want to see a number that would be a good golf score."...Twitter account is @samroperlove.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Played in 19 Web.com Tour events, making five cuts. Had one top 10, a T9 at the United Leasing Championship in May. Finished 129th on the Regular Season money list. 2014: Finished T43 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Qualified for the U.S. Open and played the Wyndham Championship on the PGA TOUR (missed cut in both). Previously played on the Hopkins Professional Tour and eGolf Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time Conference USA Player of the Week...Second-team All-Conference USA in his senior year...Finished second in a playoff at the 2013 Southern Amateur...Won a college tournament at the Ocean Course at Kiawah Island, S.C.
tourBios.personal: Attended Hewitt-Trussville (Alabama) High School...Favorite college team is the University of Alabama-Birmingham and favorite professional team is the New Orleans Saints...Favorite athlete is Bo Jackson and entertainer is Hank Williams, Jr...Dream foursome would be rounded out by his dad, Adam Scott and Jack Nicklaus...Charitable involvement includes time with Eagles Wings, a center for adults with moderate to severe intellectual and physical disabilities located in Tuscaloosa...Superstitions include marking his ball with a quarter from the 1950s or 1960s because "I want to see a number that would be a good golf score."...Twitter account is @samroperlove.
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-16 at USA East #1 Q-School (subject to re-shuffle)

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T9th in 2015 at the United Leasing Championship Presented by PTI.
